title: Having problems with league of legends
body: Iam having problems with my league of legends downloading when its downloading in main page its shows me 32 procents and after 2 hours its still shows same thing so i  been wonderring if i need some some programs or something.

replies.body:
That's most likely an issue with your permissions blocking the patcher from updating the game files. Once the patcher gets to around 32-33% it needs to start updating those game files and without specific permissions, it won't be able to access them. 

Run through the steps in this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and then make sure to launch the client as admin and you should be good to go!
